title: Responsive Web Design
overview: Responsive Web Design teaches learners how to create websites that look great and function well on all devices. Using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, participants will learn techniques to build adaptable and user-friendly web interfaces. The course focuses on hands-on projects to help learners apply design principles in real-world scenarios.
courseDetails: In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of responsive web design, ensuring that your websites are optimized for various devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. Projects will include building multi-page websites, incorporating interactive elements, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
certification: Upon completing this course, you will receive a certificate, qualifying you as a certified Responsive Web Designer.
